=== Open vSwitch tools ===

The Open vSwitch user-space tools ('openvswitch-switch') are compatible with any version of the DKMS or native in-tree openvswitch module:

<pre>
sudo apt-get install openvswitch-switch
</pre>

==== Notes ====

lts-raring and lts-saucy are backports of the openvswitch-datapath-dkms from 13.04 and 13.10 respectively.

No DKMS package is required for the 3.13 kernel, as it has built in support for GRE and VXLAN tunnels.
